leg.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: one of the long parts of your body that your feet are joined to, or a similar part on an animal or insect
leg.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: a young boy with skinny legs
She fell and broke her leg.
leg.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: the leg of an animal when it is cooked and eaten as food
leg.translation[0].definitions[2].defini: one of the upright parts that support a piece of furniture
leg.translation[0].definitions[2].exampl: One of the legs on the table was a bit wobbly.
leg.translation[0].definitions[3].defini: the part of your trousers that covers your leg
leg.translation[0].definitions[3].exampl: The legs of my jeans were covered in mud.
He rolled up his trouser legs and waded out into the stream.
leg.translation[0].definitions[4].defini: one part of a long journey or race
leg.translation[0].definitions[4].exampl: the final leg of the Tour de France
leg.translation[0].definitions[5].defini: one of the series of games in a football competition played between two teams
leg.translation[0].definitions[5].exampl: Leeds will have to win the second leg if they are to go forward to the finals.
